model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Board

  • public final class Board
extends java.util.Observable
    A representation of a Tetris game board.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char BOTTOM_BORDER_CHAR
      The character used in toString() to represent the bottom border.
      static char CURRENT_PIECE_BLOCK_CHAR
      The character used in toString() to represent a block of the current piece.
      static char EMPTY_BLOCK_CHAR
      The character used in toString() to represent an empty block.
      static char FROZEN_BLOCK_CHAR
      The character used in toString() to represent a frozen block.
      static int MIN_SIZE
      The minimum acceptable width and height for a Tetris Board..
      static int ROWS_ABOVE_BOARD
      The number of rows that exist above the visible board area.
      static char SIDE_BORDER_CHAR
      The character used in toString() to represent a side border.

      • Board

        public Board(int theWidth,
     int theHeight)
        Constructs a new board with the specified dimensions and the specified random seed for the piece generator.
        Parameters:
        theWidth - The width - must be >= MIN_SIZE.
        theHeight - The height - must be >= MIN_SIZE.

      • Board

        public Board(int theWidth,
     int theHeight,
     java.util.List<ImmutablePiece> theSequence)
        Constructs a new board with the specified dimensions and the specified sequence of pieces to use.
        Parameters:
        theWidth - The width - must be >= MIN_SIZE.
        theHeight - The height - must be >= MIN_SIZE.
        theSequence - The sequence.
